subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Although he lied, cheated and ruined his legacy, Alex Rodriguez was cheered robustly on Monday, opening day at Yankee Stadium. He rewarded the fans with a hit, one of only three by the Yankees.
snippet: Although he lied, cheated and ruined his legacy, Alex Rodriguez was cheered robustly on Monday, opening day at Yankee Stadium. He rewarded the fans with a hit, one of only three by the Yankees.
